title: 5 Minute Chocolate Cake
materialsRequired: 4 tablespoons flour - make sure you measure it right - or the cake is a lie!
2 tablespoons whisked egg - 1 egg is too much, 1 egg white is too eggy, 1 yolk is too dense, but 2 tblsp is just right!
splash vanilla or other flavoring - try peppermint or cinnamon

step1.title: Mix Ingredients
step1.text: Add all of the dry ingredients to the mug and mix. Then add the egg and combine well. Stir in the milk and oil, and finish with chocolate chips and splash of vanilla. Stir well.

step2.title: Nuke it
step2.text: Microwave for 3~4 minutes. It will start to crown over the top of the mug. It will collapse once the heat stops.

step3.title: Eat it
step3.text: Try it out, experiment with different amounts of ingredietns and cooking time. EZ
